name: All Stars
description:
Launch yourself through space like an all star. Jump on top of and through the credits through an endless credits sequence. For best effect, play this song in the background of the game (since we do not own rights to the song). Playable credits sequence (not actually credits for a real game) submission for Credits Jam 2020.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space

Known bug: when in full screen, spam Space to jump instead of just holding jump

Credits:

Tom Ayalon (programming)

Celine Tang (art)

Sabrina Wong (programming)

Jasmine Zhang (programming)

and all of the inspirational video game characters

Music credits: Feslyian Studios (royalty free music)
